Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Target

  • public class Target
extends GameObject
    The "Target" class, a specific type of GameObject, and used in the Game class to handle logic. When this is hit by a laser, will be removed from the game.
    Version:
    V1.0.0, 10 June, 2014
    Author:
    Illya Pilipenko, modified by Erik Trinh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Target(int width, int height, java.awt.image.BufferedImage icon)
      A constructor for the class, sets a random x-coord; a predetermined y-coord; width, height, and icon/image.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class GameObject

        getAngle, getHeight, getImage, getRect, getWidth, getX, getY, move, setAngle

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Target

        public Target(int width,
      int height,
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage icon)
        A constructor for the class, sets a random x-coord; a predetermined y-coord; width, height, and icon/image. Also sets up the Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        width - int for the width.
        height - int for the height.
        icon - BufferedImage for the image to be displayed representing this object.
